fields.fieldText: Add a Contract Line Item Group First

value.stringValue: Not in Library? Add New One by Sliding Toggle.

fields.fieldText: Add New Condition/Exclusion (Saving to Library Optional)

fields.name: Save_Second_to_Product_Category_Library
fields.fieldText: Save Second to Product Category Library

fields.name: msgInstrInternal_0_0
fields.fieldText: Add Any Notes or Special Instructions for this Product

fields.name: msgAddConditionsWhen_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
In the next screen, you will be able to Add Conditions/Exclusions on individual Line Items.


If this is a General Line Item to be replaced by specific products, Add Conditions/Exclusions to these notes.

value.stringValue: Choose which Contract Line Item Group or....

fields.name: exitAddNewGroup
fields.fieldText: Group Not Listed Above. Need to Add a New One.

value.stringValue: ERROR !!! No Action was taken to Change Data
Cannot start the action to Add a Product without the Standard Price Book assigned to the Opportunity.

fields.name: msgErrorData
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity Id: {!recordinputOppty.Id}

Opportunity.Pricebook2Id:{!recordinputOppty.Pricebook2Id}

fields.name: msgAttention
fields.fieldText:
Attention !!

This Standard Price Book needs to be Selected on the Opportunity!


**Immediate Workaround: Follow these Steps Please**


1.  Take a Screenshot of this message and the data or use a camera phone.

2.  Attach image to a communication to your Local Salesforce Admin.

3.  After reading these instructions, click the Finish button to end this Flow Action and return to the refreshed Opportunity of origin.

4.  On the Opportunity page, go to the Details section and Edit the Price Book field by clicking on the displayed X, if there is an existing Price Book and then using the dropdown search input and click Standard Price Book.

5.  Save the Opportunity and try to Add Products Used for...

fields.name: msgConsoleFinish
fields.fieldText:
{!noProductsSelected} Line Items added successfully.

To add Conditions and Exclusions to Line Items,

click on the Product in the Products list below to view/edit each Line Item.

Click Finish

fields.name: msgFinishLEX
fields.fieldText:
{!noProductsSelected} Line Items added successfully.

To add Conditions and Exclusions to Line Items,

click on the Product in the Products list below to view/edit each Line Item.

Click Finish

value.stringValue: Select Product Pay Items to Add to the Opportunity
Add Products from the Standard Price Book to Opportunity Line Items
Select 1 to Filter the Pay Item Products by what they are Used For
